name: Valley of Cork Oaks, Southwest Portugal
description: A lush valley in southwest Portugal, filled with ancient cork oak trees, rolling hills, and vibrant wildlife.

areas.name: River
areas.description: A gentle river winds through the valley, its banks shaded by cork oaks.

areas.name: Cork Oak Grove
areas.description: Dense clusters of cork oak trees, their bark harvested for centuries.

areas.name: Fern Meadow
areas.description: A lush meadow carpeted with ferns, cool and shaded beneath the cork oaks.

areas.name: Hilltop View
areas.description: A high point overlooking the valley and distant mountains.

areas.name: Monte do Barro
areas.description: A welcoming house in the valley where Lian, Arturo, Alma, Daphna, Yanai, and Ilay live together. The road is on one side and a cliff, forest, and river on the other.

areas.name: Moinho do Bispo
areas.description: The area at the end of the valley where Gil, Yael, Omer, and Nomi live together in a family house.

areas.name: Valley Road
areas.description: A winding dirt road that runs through the valley, connecting its main areas.

areas.name: Cork Oak and Medronho Forest
areas.description: A dense forest of cork oaks and medronho trees, rich in biodiversity.

areas.name: Lake
areas.description: A tranquil lake reflecting the sky, surrounded by cork oaks and wildlife.

special.name: Cliff
special.description: A steep cliff next to Lian's house, leading down to the forest and river.
